structure.unit: Chapter 11C DEVELOPMENT WITHIN FLOOD HAZARD DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: Effect of provisions upon ordinances, building code, other regulations.

text.section: This chapter shall supersede any conflicting county ordinance, building code or any other county regulation to the extent that this chapter imposes more stringent requirements for the use or development of any lands or structures within SFH or CHH Areas in the unincorporated areas of the county. It is not intended to repeal, modify, or change any such county ordinance, building code or other county regulation except as herein stated.
